name: Lama Media
tagline: Digital products to reach your business goals
description:
Lama Media is a software house composed of experienced specialists who design, create and develop web & mobile applications, e-commerce platforms and complex websites. We are also open to joining your team and remotly working on your project.
We digitally express ideas by high-end web design and agile IT solutions.
 
Working on complex projects made us appreciate the transparent communication with a client. We base on Scrum methodology to improve the development process  and understand client’s needs better.
Our applications and platforms have one major purpose: to help our clients reach their business goals, which usually means increasing sales.
